description: Number of 2n-bead black-white reversible complementable necklaces with n black beads.
references: J. A. Hoskins, C. E. Praeger and A. P. Street, Balanced twills with bounded float length, Congress. Numerantium, 40 (1983), 77-89.
W. D. Hoskins; Anne Penfold Street, Twills on a given number of harnesses, J. Austral. Math. Soc. Ser. A 33 (1982), no. 1, 1-15.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to bracelets
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
